events.message: I recently ordered a pair of headphones, but I want to return them because they don't meet my expectations and I am unhappy with the sound quality.
The customer's request regarding returning a product has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the mention of 'return' and dissatisfaction.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M., who will assist the customer with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your headphones. I'll be happy to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product packaging is intact or if there are any damages?
Sure, the order number is 456789123. The packaging looks fine, and there are no damages, but I just donâ€™t like how the headphones sound.
Thank you for the info. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send back the product within 14 days, and we'll process your refund as soon as we receive it.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will return the headphones soon.
The refund process has been explained clearly to the customer, and the issue is now marked as resolved pending product return.
Just checking in to confirm if you have returned the headphones and if you need further assistance with your refund.
I sent the headphones back yesterday. Please let me know when the refund is processed.
The refund has been processed successfully. The customer should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
The case is now closed after confirming the refund processing and addressing all customer concerns.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
